name: The Black Darkness
description:
Part 2 of the The Crystal SIgil saga, 8.5x11 comic book 44 pages black and white color cover. The story of the Starseed Children continues, the indigo child is infected by a internal Black Darkness and is transforming into something unseen.









<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/54B-Xl_YceY" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: The Sigil Crystal
description:
CRYSTAL SIGIL BOOK NOW AVAILABLE. 144 pages black and white,

The Crystal Sigil a comic book.

"The Cristal Sigil bubbles with craetivity and energy. Cartoonist Charles Gaubitz is really one to watch, he has a unique and engaging storytelling voice and the bold, expressive brush stroke to back it up!"

the annual publication from Houghton-Mifflin-Harcourt, THE BEST AMERICAN COMICS 2012, was released. THE CRYSTAL SIGIL was selected as one of the “Notable Comics” of 2012!THE CRYSTAL SIGIL first saw print in PANEL TO PANEL book one. www.paneltopanel.com
